greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Smallest m in range 1..phi(2n+1) such that 12^m == 1 mod 2n+1, or 0 if no such number exists.
comment: a(n)=2*n if 2*n+1 is in A019340, otherwise a(n)<2*n. - _Robert Israel_, Apr 17 2019
link: Robert Israel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
maple: if n mod 3 = 1 then 0 else numtheory:-order(12,2*n+1) fi
mathematica: a[n_] := Module[{s}, s = SelectFirst[Range[EulerPhi[2n+1]], PowerMod[12, #, 2n+1] == 1&]; If[s === Missing["NotFound"], 0, s]];
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_ and _Amarnath Murthy_, May 08 2002
